item.content:encoded:
Zumio

by Matthew Nolan on 03/20/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Review Comics »
  • Vibrators

A big thanks to the Zumio team for sending us this LASER BEAM VIBRATOR.

Obviously what doesn’t work for Erika may indeed be what works for you! By all accounts, it’s blowing A LOT of minds out there.

Check it out, but don’t feel too pressured to pick this one up because that asking price is pretty darn high! Could be a good Black Friday kind of purchase? At the very least it’s a fun review and sent us down memory lane. We DO recommend it, just you know, not for us.

Buy it from one of our Friends (With Benefits)

Stockroom ALSO has a 15% discount for you, just add ‘OHJOY’ at checkout!

item.title: Vaginal Intercourse
item.dc:creator: Erika Moen
item.description: Our society holds up penis-in-vagina sex in a way that isn’t… necessarily healthiest for everyone. Before you get down n’ dirty, ask yourself: Am I ready for sex? and what does my Sexual Response Cycle look like? Like all of our educational comics, the information we share here is just the tip of the iceberg […]
item.content:encoded:
Vaginal Intercourse

by Erika Moen on 03/13/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Favorites »
  • How To

Our society holds up penis-in-vagina sex in a way that isn’t… necessarily healthiest for everyone. Before you get down n’ dirty, ask yourself: Am I ready for sex? and what does my Sexual Response Cycle look like?

Like all of our educational comics, the information we share here is just the tip of the iceberg and we fully encourage you to do some more reading up on your own at places that can dive more in-depth on the subjects we introduce.

As ever, Scarleteen remains the definitive source for learning about everything that relates to sex. If you can, please kick them a dollar or two to support their hard work!

Intercourse(s) Resources


► First Intercourse 101
► My Corona: The Hymen & the Myths That Surround It
► Yield for Pleasure
► Hours of Intercourse? Nope. (And also: Ow.)
► Why would intercourse feel good for women?
► Ready or Not? The Scarleteen Sex Readiness Checklist
► Why do girls bleed after or before intercourse is over?
► One Bloody Mess: Myths & Realities of Bleeding with First Intercourse
► Is THAT All There Is?
► Is intercourse a violence or a violation?

Remember, sex should be pleasurable for both you and your partner. If vaginal intercourse just ain’t your thing? That is noooo problem, cos YOU HAVE SO MANY OTHER AWESOME SEXY ACTIVITIES TO PARTAKE IN! Sexting, dry humping, grinding, mutual masturbation, cock sucking, pussy licking, finger fucking, muffing, butt fucking, and on and on and on! Lucky you, you have so many fun things to explore by yourself and consensually with a partner. Good luck!

└ Tags: dick, education, penetration, penis, sex, strap-on, vagina, vaginal intercourse

item.title: My First Year of Polyamory by Sara Valta
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: ECCC is DONE-zos! And gosh it was SO amazing. Thank you, everyone, for coming out and making us feel so loved. It was wonderful and empowering and gosh, we miss it already (want to see how it went? Check out our silly tweets from the past week, tons of photos and all!) While our hearts […]
item.content:encoded:
My First Year of Polyamory by Sara Valta

by Matthew Nolan on 03/06/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Adventures »
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Story Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

ECCC is DONE-zos! And gosh it was SO amazing. Thank you, everyone, for coming out and making us feel so loved. It was wonderful and empowering and gosh, we miss it already (want to see how it went? Check out our silly tweets from the past week, tons of photos and all!)

While our hearts are full, our bodies are WRECKS! We’ll be taking a few days to recover, then cracking on with making some sex ed comics! I know, I know – we’ve done 4 guest comics in a row and you deserve some Erika comics – but listen, we’ve been working on some awesome secret stuff and did a convention! To keep you satiated… did you hear about our NEW EDUCATION BOOK we’re gonna Kickstart in MAY?!?!

Today we’ve got a wonderful, personal comic from the talented Sara Valta on her first year of Polyamory. We heard from SO many of you at the con that you’re looking for MORE poly content, and I’ll try to sign on more artists for that subject as I go! In the meantime, give Sara’s a read over and, heck, go tell her how great she is on Social Media – that sort of positive feedback means the world <3

  • Portfolio
  • Twitter
  • Tumblr
  • Alchemilla Webcomic

See you all next week, when -fingers crossed- we’ll have a comic for you on Vaginal Intercourse!!!

└ Tags: autobio, personal, poly, polyamory, sara, sara valta, sarah, story

item.title: This Year’s Book – DRAWN TO SEX!!!
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Oh my gosh you guys, we have some AMAZING news to share with you. We’ve been keeping it hush-hush but now that ECCC is hitting (which we’re working – check out the info here!), both Limerence Press and OJST are finally able to talk about it! We are making a PURELY SEX EDUCATION OJST COLLECTION! […]
item.content:encoded:
This Year’s Book – DRAWN TO SEX!!!

by Matthew Nolan on 03/01/2018 at 12:05 am
Posted In: Blog

Oh my gosh you guys, we have some AMAZING news to share with you.
We’ve been keeping it hush-hush but now that ECCC is hitting (which we’re working – check out the info here!), both Limerence Press and OJST are finally able to talk about it!

We are making a PURELY SEX EDUCATION OJST COLLECTION!

I’ts called DRAWN TO SEX!!!!

Kickstarter STARTS MID-MAY 2018

Follow Erika or Matt on Twitter to be double sure you don’t miss it.

Our aim is to make a few volumes, with this first one covering JUST the basics. Take a look at our education comics and look for the ones you might want to see in your FIRST sex ed book – chances are that’ll be in THIS BOOK! It’s gonna be all the good education-y stuff without the sex toy reviews and guests this time. It’ll be a more timeless and helpful book for those looking to learn about sex and wince at our bad dad jokes. We’ll be talking more about it closer to the Kickstarter, but here’s a sneak peek of the cover!

Same sort of thing as the previous years – we’re working with Limerence Press and will be Kickstarting for our own copies to sell and payment to live on, while they print for retail. SO EXCITED YOU GUYS.

I hope you’re all as excited as we are! The next few years are going to be amazing, we’ve got so many other secrete things in the pipelines =D =D =D

Here’s the Official Press Release (with our pals at Limerence’s info – if you’re a retailer and want to get in touch)…

Erika and Matthew are ready to talk about sex! Have you ever had a question about sex, but didn’t know who to ask? Well, Erika and Matthew have spent years learning, talking, and creating informative comics about all aspects of sex. Using comics, jokes, and frank communication, they’re here to demystify the world of sex and answer your questions—including ones you might not even know you had!

In this first book of the Drawn to Sex series, they explore the practical side of sex, from the basics of what defines sex, to barriers and testing, masturbation, and the ins-and-outs of having sex with other people.

Pick up this fun book if you’re looking to learn something new, understand sexuality better, or know someone (maybe you!) who might benefit from some judgment-free education. Erika and Matthew are here to help you out!

“We’re back and making the book we’ve always dreamed of! Nothing but sex education!” shouted Matthew Nolan. “After years of work, with the help from our pals at Limerence, we’re making you a book that’ll your answer your questions whether you’re starting out your sex life or you’re an old hardy pro. We’re gonna hit all the important notes, cover all the basics, and hopefully make you laugh along the way.”

For more information, follow Limerence Press on Twitter, or check out the Oh Joy Sex Toy website. Additional queries may be sent to the Oni Press Director of Publicity, Melissa Meszaros: melissa at onipress dot com

└ Tags: book, drawn to sex, education, Limerence, limerence press, oni, oni press

item.title: Emerald City Comic Con 2018
item.dc:creator: Erika Moen
item.description: Emerald City Comic Con March 1 – 4, Seattle Sky Bridge, Booth 1102 (At Topatoco) Matt and I’ll be selling our various books at Topatoco‘s bank of tables on the Sky Bridge and I’ll also be speaking on a number of panels! THE WORLD OF WEBCOMICS: HOW TO MAKE ART (AND MONEY) ON THE INTERNET […]
item.content:encoded:
Emerald City Comic Con 2018

by Erika Moen on 02/27/2018 at 11:56 am
Posted In: Blog




Emerald City Comic Con
March 1 – 4, Seattle
Sky Bridge, Booth 1102 (At Topatoco)

Matt and I’ll be selling our various books at Topatoco‘s bank of tables on the Sky Bridge and I’ll also be speaking on a number of panels!

THE WORLD OF WEBCOMICS: HOW TO MAKE ART (AND MONEY) ON THE INTERNET
March 1, 2018, 1:30 PM – 2:30 PM, TCC L3 – Room 5
Webcomic creators have been expanding the medium for decades but how do they do it successfully? Join webcomic creators Ananth Hirsh and Yuko Ota (Johnny Wander, Lucky Penny), Erika Moen (Oh Joy Sex Toy), Tess Stone (Not Drunk Enough), and Sarah Graley (Our Super Adventure) as they discuss advice for aspiring comic creators, self-promotion, establishing a brand (and boundaries), and the differences between digital and print publishing.

MASTERING MENTORSHIP: HOW PROS AND AMATEURS CAN HELP EACH OTHER THRIVE
March 1, 2018, 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM, TCC L3 – Room 5
The comics world is full of creators honing their craft, but how can we better connect established pros and up-and-comers for the betterment of all? Join Lucy Bellwood (Mentorship Program Coordinator, Helioscope), Alissa Sallah (veteran intern of Milkfed Criminal Masterminds & Helioscope, Oni Press), Erika Moen (Oh Joy Sex Toy), and Danielle Corsetto (Girls with Slingshots) for a discussion about finding mentorship opportunities, owning our strengths, and advancing new careers in comics.

BOATS AND BONERS: A FIRESIDE CHAT WITH LUCY BELLWOOD AND ERIKA MOEN
March 2, 2018, 6:15 PM – 7:15 PM, TCC L3 – Room 2
Join two cartoonists who have turned their niche passions (the nautical and the naughty) into successful careers in the world of comics earning them professional accolades and invitations to guest lecture at universities and appear at events around the world for an intimate fireside chat. Bellwood and Moen will unpack their combined 20+ years of hard-won industry experience and probably talk about their feelings a bunch too. Yes, there will be a real fireside. No, this is not a joke.

I got my hair freshly re-dyed for this so y’all better come say hi ;)

└ Tags: Appearance, comicon, convention, eccc, emerald city comic-con, emerald city comicon, speaking

item.title: Moonlighting by Kelevtov
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Erika and I are FINALLY done with our top secret work… but now we’re getting ready for ECCC, so you’re all getting an extra dose of guest comics! Emerald City Comic Con! March 1 – 4 in Seattle Skybridge Booth 1102 I found Kelevetov’s work almost a year ago, and jumped at the chance of […]
item.content:encoded:
Moonlighting by Kelevtov

by Matthew Nolan on 02/27/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Story Comics »
  • Interviews

Erika and I are FINALLY done with our top secret work… but now we’re getting ready for ECCC, so you’re all getting an extra dose of guest comics!


Emerald City Comic Con!
March 1 – 4 in Seattle
Skybridge Booth 1102

I found Kelevetov’s work almost a year ago, and jumped at the chance of having them on for a short comic. It’s not really often we hear someone’s personal story on how they became a professional furry smut artist! Thanks for the lovely honest comic, K!

Drop them a hello if you liked their work!

  • FurAffinity
  • Twitter

Next week we’ll have another guest comic, sex ed comics after – I promise!

item.title: My History with Planned Parenthood by Rachel Dukes
item.dc:creator: Erika Moen
item.description: It’s such an honor to feature Rachel Dukes’ personal story about Planned Parenthood here! Thank you so much for sharing this with us ♡ ♡ ♡ I also relied heavily on Planned Parenthood during my 20s and continue to support them to this day, they’re an absolutely indispensable health resource. Didja know you can set […]
item.content:encoded:
My History with Planned Parenthood by Rachel Dukes

by Erika Moen on 02/20/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Education »
  • Guest Story Comics »
  • Interviews

It’s such an honor to feature Rachel Dukes’ personal story about Planned Parenthood here! Thank you so much for sharing this with us ♡ ♡ ♡ I also relied heavily on Planned Parenthood during my 20s and continue to support them to this day, they’re an absolutely indispensable health resource. Didja know you can set up an automatically recurring donation to them? And, of course, you can always make a one time donation as well on that same page.

  • Frankie Comics
  • Instagram

  • Facebook
  • StoreEnvy

I couldn’t send Alex a contract fast enough when he expressed an interest in the AMAZING Tokidoki Vibrator by Lovehoney (fyi – costs about $110ish). Holy smokes what a combo of toy and cartoonist <3 <3 <3


I hope you’re all as excited as I am about this toy this week. Alex is a staple here now, with two other brave and honest comics (Puppy Play and Buck Off Review) go follow him and tell him how amazing he is.

item.content:encoded:
Lustery

by Matthew Nolan on 02/06/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Porn & Websites »
  • Review Comics

Valentines is NEXT week! So here’s a review of a last minute gift both you and yours can enjoy!

Lustery is pretty interesting, I enjoyed visiting it! I don’t think it’ll be a staple of our porn consuming diet, but I think it’s worth a subscription to go and check out. We’re both huge suckers for amateur porn, and this is some finely curated content. A great soft introduction to porn if you’re looking for one! Vanilla and easy to consume with real humans being themselves.

  • Lustery

It is worth checking out that comic not just because I genuinely liked this toy (This was before my sex toy reviewing days so I PAID FULL PRICE FOR IT) but also because, LOL, I discovered it after […]
item.content:encoded:
Mystic Rechargeable

by Erika Moen on 01/30/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Review Comics »
  • Vibrators

Like I mentioned in the comic, I reviewed the original Mystic Wand waaay back in the day. It is worth checking out that comic not just because I genuinely liked this toy (This was before my sex toy reviewing days so I PAID FULL PRICE FOR IT) but also because, LOL, I discovered it after being eliminated as a contestant on a reality TV show. You can read about it in the aforementioned comic!

But yeah, back on topic: The Mystic Rechargeable. Wow. I really fucking love it. I’m so impressed Vibratex actually improved a product that was practically perfect already.
